:::{v-scope="{ showPlot: false }"}

```{r}
#| echo: false
htmltools::tagList(
  htmltools::tags$button(
    "Toggle plot",
    "@click" = "showPlot = !showPlot"
  )
)
```

```{r}
#| v-if: "showPlot"
#| echo: false
plot(sin(seq(0, 50, 0.1)))
```

```{r}
#| v-else: ""
#| echo: false
htmltools::div(
  "v-for" = sprintf("row in %s", jsonlite::toJSON(mtcars[1:5, ])),
  htmltools::div("{{ row._row }}")
)
```

:::
